churchManenos.pastorDescription: Annointed by the blood of Jesus

churchManenos.wifeDescription: Companion and prayer partner of the man of God

churchManenos.verse: Matthew 6:26-27 26 Look at the birds of the air; they do not sow or reap or store away in barns, and yet your heavenly Father feeds them. Are you not much more valuable than they? 27 Can any one of you by worrying add a single hour to your life
